Identify and summarize any suspicious or fraudulent activity based on fraud scores or repeated patterns.Detect any unusual transaction behaviors (e.g., sudden high-value transfers, frequent transactions from the same account).Group users who are involved in multiple high-fraud-score transactions.Provide trends over time, such as peak fraud periods or accounts repeatedly involved in flagged activity.Highlight any correlations between user details (e.g., location, user ID) and fraudulent activity.Please return the insights in a concise bullet-point format. Do not include any Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in your analysis or output.Provide only data-backed insights based on the input.Do NOT fabricate or hallucinate trends or values not present in the dataset.If no significant insights or anomalies are found, clearly state: - No significant patterns or suspicious activity found based on the provided data.
